html: (2 Nephi 16:4)."The posts of the door moved." The foundations of the threshold moved or trembled. "These could be the posts of the doorway leading into the Holy of Holies of the Jerusalem temple, or the heavenly doorway that leads into God's presence. In either case, that there is a door or gateway into the divine presence is a concept that is also suggested in other scriptures. (John 10; 2 Ne. 9:41; Isa. 22:22.)" (IPSP, 130.)
